original_text: They only think about wrong and bad things that they want to do. They want many things for themselves. They want to hurt other people. They are always jealous of other people. They kill people. They quarrel and fight with people. They are not honest or kind. They say silly things about other people.
korean_text: 곧 모든 불의, 추악, 탐욕, 악의가 가득한 자요 시기, 살인, 분쟁, 사기, 악독이 가득한 자요 수군수군하는 자요

sentences.original_text: They only think about wrong and bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 오직 잘못되고 나쁜 것들에 대해서만 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: They want many things for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신을 위해 많은 것들을 원합니다

sentences.original_text: They want to hurt other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들을 해치고 싶어 합니다

sentences.original_text: They are always jealous of other people
They quarrel and fight with people
They are not honest or kind
They say silly things about other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들에 대해 어리석은 말들을 합니다
